attributes.action: Recommend Steve Peat for a Knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Steve Peat is a world Class sports star.  Who over the years has almost single handedly put British Down Hill Mountain Biking on the map.  After his recent wins he has now become the most successful rider of all time. He has done more for mountain Biking than anyone has done any other sport.  Steve Peat is worthy of a knighthood.  Please show your support for the worlds greatest rider.

Thankyou.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
